steps: Hard boil two eggs. Once cooked, cool them under cold water, peel, and chop them into small pieces.
Toast two slices of bread to your desired crispness.
In a small bowl, combine the chopped eggs with mayonnaise, mixing well.
Spread the egg mixture evenly over one slice of toasted bread.
If desired, drizzle ketchup over the egg mixture.
Place the second slice of toasted bread on top to complete the sandwich. Serve immediately.
